title: Eriq La Salle will not reprise Darryl Jenks role in Coming to America 2
text:
Eriq La Salle will not reprise role in Coming 2 America (Picture: Getty Images)

Eriq La Salle will not be reprising his iconic character Darryl Jenks in Coming 2 America, and we can’t say we’re not slightly disappointed by the news.

When appearing at NBC’s fifth annual press day, in Chicago, the 57-year-old spoke about his current projects, and the sequel to the 1988 movie was not one of them.

He told The Grio that he had no plans to return to the much-loved film.

‘I’ve already given you an answer. No,’ he said, before adding: ‘Straight to the point. I knew where you were going with it.’

He went onto promote his latest series Chicago P.D. from Law & Order‘s Dick Wolf, adding: ‘I’m a little busy right now… with this show.

‘Our show is very different than [Chicago Fire] and [Chicago Med]. So the gratifying thing for us is everyone [is] just telling their truth.

He played Darryl Jenks (Picture: Getty Images)

‘This is our storytelling in this universe, this is their storytelling and when you put them all together, you still have those elements.

Advertisement

Advertisement

‘It’s really cool to co-exist in this universe but [it] feels like you have your own individuality.’

But while he has his hands full with Chicago P.D, that doesn’t mean members of the original Coming to America won’t be reprising their roles. And they’ve already started filming.

Yes, Eddie Murphy has been spotted in full kit as Prince Akeem, alongside Arsenio Hall who has hopped straight back into the role of Rev. Brown.

Eddie Murphy is returning as Prince Akeem (Picture: FilmMagic)

Now, 30 years on, Arsenio will also be joined by stars including Tracy Morgan, Leslie Jones and Luenell.

According to The Hollywood Reporter, Morgan will play a character called Reem, a hustler who is the brother of Jones’ character, who has a one-night stand with Murphy’s alter-ego Akeem.

As well as Leslie, Wesley Snipes and Kiki Layne are among the new cast members.

Murphy recently said in a statement: ‘After many years of anticipation, I’m thrilled that Coming to America 2 is officially moving forward.

‘We’ve assembled a great team that will be led by Craig Brewer, who just did an amazing job on Dolemite [Is My Name], and I’m looking forward to bringing all these classic and beloved characters back to the big screen.’

Advertisement

Advertisement

It’s thought that the new movie is slated for release in December 2020.

description: Eriq La Salle will not reprise Darryl Jenks role in Coming to America 2.
